Package it.uninsubria.client.controller.homepage.categories

Class CategoriesController.CategoryCard

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.client.controller.homepage.categories.CategoriesController.CategoryCard
Enclosing class:
CategoriesController
private class CategoriesController.CategoryCard extends Object
Represents a category card in the UI grid. Contains category information and manages the visual representation. Each card displays category name, book count, and preview of books.
